alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Grant; Jackson; La Salle; Natchitoches; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 5:43PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT GRANT...WESTERN CALDWELL... SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON...CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES...NORTHWESTERN LA SALLE AND WINN PARISHES THROUGH 615 PM CST... At 543 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Winnfield to 12 miles north of Hutton. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Winnfield, Colfax, Olla, Montgomery, Urania, Natchez, Clarence, Dry Prong, Goldonna, Tullos, Dodson, Georgetown, Calvin, Atlanta, Sikes, Vixen, Cloutierville, Melrose, and Bellwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Grant; Jackson; La Salle; Natchitoches; Winn
